answers.answer: I'm 29 weeks and I'm only 142 I started at 155 myvdoctor says its normal as long as you and baby are healthy
No everyone is different.....if your doctor isn't concerned then you shouldn't be.
ill be 17wks on friday and i havent gained anything...ur fine =]
You're fine. Ill be 29 weeks and have gained only 3 pounds
I'm almost 30 weeks and so far have only gained 5 lbs. Everyone gains differently! :)
My hubby is kinda concerned. I am only 120lbs and gained the 3lbs.
Most women have hardly gained anything by 15 weeks. Nothing much there to cause weight gain. Most of all your weight gain will come in the late second and third trimester, nothing to worry about.
Some people loose weight in their first trimester...so gaining 3lb isn't real
Realy bad:) I started putting lb in my second trimester and so far I gained 20 lb :)I started at 118 lb

I'm almost 15 weeks & I asked my doctor the same question. His response was "3 pounds at 14 weeks is normal, anything higher than that right now I would have to tell you to slow down because you run the risk of gestational diabetes"

question: I am 15 weeks pregnant. I only gained 2-3 lbs. Should i be concerned?
title: weight gain
